content: My dog's name is Belysh. This summer I taught him to put out his paw. Every morning I wake up early and feed him. Then we go for a walk. He defends me from other dogs. When I go bike riding, he runs beside me. He has a friend, her name is Chernyshka. He likes playing with her. Belysh is a very kind and clever dog.
translations: ita:Il mio cane si chiama Belysh. Quest'estate gli ho insegnato a mettere la zampa. Ogni mattina mi sveglio presto e gli do
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Monk (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
